title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 600.15 - Reinstatement of program registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 600.15 - Reinstatement of program registration

State Regulations

Any apprenticeship program deregistered pursuant to section
600.14
of this Part may be
reinstated upon presentation of adequate evidence to the commissioner that the
apprenticeship program is operating in accordance with this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
600.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
